products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Rock - Roller Blind
products.description: Ajanta rock is a blackout blind that proves once and for all that style and substance can work together in perfect harmony. The neutral grey combines with an electric pattern that catches the light in a thousand different ways depending on which way you look at it. Now that you've found your dream blinds you can get busy reimagining the rest of your interiors. The floors and walls are natural places to start as they frame your window spaces and help connect them to the rest of your room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The blackest of blacks, the palermo (blackout) black is not for shy and retiring rooms. This is a blind that wants to stand out and be noticed, and noticed it certainly will be. With the latest blackout technology, this blind is a must for a night-time feel all day long. Create a moody focal point in a home office or dining room by adding the palermo black to a monochrome colour scheme, and accessorise with bright red or hot fuchsia if you can't resist a little colour.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in cream features an off-white abstract patterning on a barely-there, almost gold cream that shimmers gently as the light hits it. It will only be your indoors light that gets to it though, as this powerful blackout blind is every bit as effective as you'd hope at keeping outside light disturbances out. Team with rich creams and the subtlest of golds in a modern, luxurious kitchen, for which the wipe-clean fabric makes it perfect.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Palace - Roller Blind
products.description: The sarra (blackout) palace really is a blackout blind fit for royalty, with its deep, dark blue and high quality grained finish. Use to keep light disturbances at bay and don't worry about how often it's used - this blind is durable and will last year upon year. This dark, regal blue will look fantastic in a blue and white kitchen, perhaps with a few bright accents, such as yellow or red. Or hang in the playroom or kids' bedroom for maximum impact against bright, fun wallpapers.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerise - Roller Blind
products.description: The vivid hot pink of the palermo (blackout) in cerise will catch your eye every time you enter the room. This blind combines fun with functionality, as its cutting edge blackout fabric and fuss-free design make this a usable and lasting window dressing. Go bright in the bathroom by offsetting the cerise against white walls and complementing it with matching towels and bathroom accessories. It would also make a funky addition to a child's bedroom when paired with lighter pinks and whites.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and rolling mechanism of the palermo mean this blackout blind will last, year after year. Couple this rich hue with dark browns and paler creams in a warm, traditional kitchen, or use in the playroom amongst bolder, more playful colours.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Code - Roller Blind
products.description: An understated, pale, green-grey shade combined with a natural twig pattern makes the rapture (blackout) code a sophisticated option for the modern home. There's more to this attractive blackout blind than just looks though; the durable fabric and easy-roll mechanism make this a practical choice too. The code is an essential choice for a contemporary kitchen with a garden view. This handsome blind would be most at home amongst subtle earth tones and muted neutrals, and could work beautifully in the hallway or utility room.
